org.codehaus.cargo.container.wildfly.internal.configuration.factory

Class WildFly9xCliConfigurationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.cargo.container.wildfly.internal.configuration.factory.WildFly8xCliConfigurationFactory
      • org.codehaus.cargo.container.wildfly.internal.configuration.factory.WildFly9xCliConfigurationFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WildFlyCliConfigurationFactory

    public class WildFly9xCliConfigurationFactory
extends WildFly8xCliConfigurationFactory
    WildFly9x CLI configuration factory returning specific configuration scripts.
